announcement.SChinese:
创建/加入公开游戏暂时可能出现致命错误
这是由于游戏服务器变更导致H系暂时无法在公开房间游玩
私人房间暂时不受影响
announcement.English:
Create/join public lobbies is temporarily unavailable
This change is due to a server-side update that makes modded public lobbies unavailable for vanilla.
Private lobbies are not affected.
Currently, this change is NOT permanent.
